
```jsjavascript

var x = 5;

var y = 2;

var sum = x + y;        // 7

var difference = x - y; // 3

var product = x * y;    // 10

var quotient = x / y;   // 2.5

var remainder = x % y;  // 1

x++; // x is now 6

y--; // y is now 1

```

```jsjavascript

var x = 5;

var y = 2;

console.log(x == y);    // false

console.log(x > y);     // true

console.log(x <= 5);    // true

console.log(x === "5"); // false

```
